DESCRIPTION: Deal damage. See #y"Mini #yTutorial" for more info.
Gain Block. See #y"Mini #yTutorial" for more info.
Reduce the cost of a card in hand. See #y"Mini #yTutorial" for more info.
When added to hand , set this to default color.
Increases the Evoke Effect of #rRed / #gGreen by X.
Strong Color Effect: Triggers Evoke Effect of this card and Strengthen Effect of other cards in hand.
Weak Color Effect: Only triggers Evoke Effect of this card.
